name: roommingle-2
description: This directory is for a website project reelating to matching students at UMass amherst with viable roommates. We are working on a website that will be integrated using a MERN stack, 1. Set up Node environment with express.js 2. Install relevant packages into node environment 3. Set up a database with MongoDB 4. Set up API routes 5. Set up frontend using React 6. Connect front end and back end 7. Deploy
